Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.cli.view

Class CharacterCardInputView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.cli.view.CharacterCardInputView
public class CharacterCardInputView extends Object
This Class represent the CharacterCardInputView that parses user input to get the parameters for using a Character Card

      private Scanner getTerminalScanner()
      Gets the terminal scanner for input parsing
      Returns:
      (type terminalScanner) teh scanner for input parsing

    • run

      public CharacterCardNetworkParamSet run() throws CharacterCardActionInvalidException
      This method finds the character card that the player purchased and asks for the parameters required to use it, before sending the message with the parameters to the server
      Throws:
      CharacterCardActionInvalidException - if there are error in the parameters or if the action cannot be executed

    • askPickStudentColor

      private Student askPickStudentColor(String descriptiveMessage)
      Asks what type of Student the Player wants to use for a specific card parameter
      Parameters:
      descriptiveMessage - (type string) The message that will be presented to the user to ask for the Student color input
      Returns:
      (type Student) The chosen Student
